data.text: Used as a greeting when trick-or-treating.
data.attributionText: from The American HeritageÂ® Dictionary of the English Language, 5th Edition.

data.text: A form of <xref>extortion</xref> by which children get <xref>candy</xref> on <xref>Halloween</xref>.
data.attributionText: from Wiktionary, Creative Commons Attribution/Share-Alike License.

data.text: a request by children on Halloween; they pass from door to door asking for goodies and threatening to play tricks on those who refuse
